---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

Ğ¢Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ° Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¸ĞºÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ ÑĞµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ´ÑŠÑ€Ğ¶Ğ° ĞºÑŠĞ¼ Ğ²ÑĞ¸Ñ‡ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ° Ğ¸ ÑƒÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ Ğ·Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ·Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğµ Ğ½Ğ° ÑƒĞµĞ± Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Ğ½Ğ° Chrome.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

long.ca:
L'extensiÃ³ Browser Boost proporciona una alternativa de codi obert que respecta la privadesa a nombroses extensions d'un sol Ãºs.

Podeu confiar en Browser Boost en lloc d'haver de confiar en mÃºltiples extensions de diversos desenvolupadors, que sovint sÃ³n de codi tancat, recullen dades d'usuari i tenen permisos no documentats.

Browser Boost no recull dades d'usuari, no requereix registre, no tÃ© servidors, Ã©s completament de codi obert i Ã©s 100% gratuÃ¯t.

-------------------------

Eines:

ğŸ”Š Augmenta el volum: augmenta el volum mÃ xim del teu navegador fins a un 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Canvia l'agent d'usuari: falsifica l'agent d'usuari per emular diferents dispositius o navegadors.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Habilita el clic dret i la selecciÃ³: forÃ§a l'activaciÃ³ de clics dret, cÃ²pia i selecciÃ³ de text als llocs que han desactivat els clics dret o les interaccions de selecciÃ³.

ğŸ’¾ Desa la imatge com a tipus: afegeix un menÃº contextual per desar imatges com a JPG, PNG o WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Desactiva WebRTC: desactiveu les solÂ·licituds WebRTC per evitar filtracions d'adreces IP.

-------------------------

Justificacions dels permisos:

tabCapture: per capturar i modificar l'Ã udio d'una pestanya. Necessari per augmentar el volum.

privadesa: per modificar l'IPHandlingPolicy. Necessari per desactivar WebRTC.

webNavigation: per activar l'oient onCommitted i onHistoryStateUpdated. Necessari per canviar l'agent d'usuari i habilitar el clic dret i seleccionar.

scripting: per injectar scripts a pÃ gines web. Necessari per canviar l'agent d'usuari i habilitar el clic dret i seleccionar.

descÃ rregues: per activar la descÃ rrega de la imatge modificada. Necessari per desar la imatge com a tipus.

contextMenus: per afegir una opciÃ³ al menÃº contextual. Necessari per desar la imatge com a tipus.

fora de pantalla: per utilitzar l'API tabCapture i el llenÃ§ HTML al treballador del servei de fons. Necessari per augmentar el volum i desar la imatge com a tipus.

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: per modificar la capÃ§alera de l'agent d'usuari. Necessari per canviar l'agent d'usuari

emmagatzematge: per emmagatzemar la configuraciÃ³ de l'usuari.

PermÃ­s de l'amfitriÃ³: per activar webNavigation a tots els llocs web. Necessari per canviar l'agent d'usuari i habilitar el clic dret i seleccionar.

-------------------------

Codi: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

Aquesta extensiÃ³ s'adhereix estrictament a totes les polÃ­tiques i condicions del servei de Chrome Web Store.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

Denne udvidelse overholder strengt alle Chrome Webshop-politikker og servicevilkÃ¥r.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

long.fil:
Ang extension ng Browser Boost ay nagbibigay ng open-source, privacy na may kinalaman sa alternatibo sa maraming single-use na extension.

Maaari kang umasa sa Browser Boost sa halip na magtiwala sa maraming extension mula sa iba't ibang developer, na kadalasang sarado ang pinagmulan, nangongolekta ng data ng user, at may kasamang mga hindi dokumentadong pahintulot.

Walang kinokolektang data ng user ang Browser Boost, hindi nangangailangan ng pag-signup, walang mga server, ganap na open source, at 100% libre.

-------------------------

Mga tool:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Taasan ang maximum volume ng iyong browser hanggang 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Baguhin ang User Agent: Spoof user agent para tularan ang iba't ibang device o browser.

ğŸ–±ï¸ I-enable ang Right Click & Select: Piliting paganahin ang mga right click, kopyahin, at pagpili ng text sa mga site na hindi pinagana ang mga right click o mga pakikipag-ugnayan sa pagpili.

ğŸ’¾ I-save ang Imahe bilang Uri: Nagdaragdag ng menu ng konteksto upang i-save ang mga larawan bilang JPG, PNG o WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Huwag paganahin ang WebRTC: Huwag paganahin ang mga kahilingan sa WebRTC upang maiwasan ang mga pagtagas ng IP address.

-------------------------

Mga Katwiran sa Pahintulot:

tabCapture: Upang makuha at baguhin ang audio ng isang tab. Kinakailangan upang palakasin ang volume.

privacy: Upang baguhin ang IPHandlingPolicy. Kinakailangan upang huwag paganahin ang WebRTC.

webNavigation: Upang ma-trigger ang onCommitted at onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Kinakailangang baguhin ang user agent at paganahin ang right click at piliin.

scripting: Upang mag-inject ng mga script sa mga webpage. Kinakailangang baguhin ang user agent at paganahin ang right click at piliin.

mga download: Upang ma-trigger ang pag-download ng binagong larawan. Kinakailangan upang i-save ang larawan bilang uri.

contextMenus: Upang magdagdag ng opsyon sa menu ng konteksto. Kinakailangan upang i-save ang larawan bilang uri.

offscreen: Upang gamitin ang tabCapture API at HTML canvas sa background service worker. Kinakailangan upang palakasin ang volume at i-save ang Larawan bilang uri.

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: Upang baguhin ang header ng user agent. Kinakailangang baguhin ang user agent

storage: Upang mag-imbak ng mga setting ng user.

Pahintulot sa host: Upang ma-trigger ang webNavigation sa bawat website. Kinakailangang baguhin ang user agent at paganahin ang right click at piliin.

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

Ang extension na ito ay mahigpit na sumusunod sa lahat ng Mga Patakaran at Tuntunin ng Serbisyo ng Chrome Web Store.

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

×ª×•×¡×£ ×–×” ××¦×™×™×ª ×œ×›×œ ×”××“×™× ×™×•×ª ×•×”×ª× ××™× ×•×”×”×’×‘×œ×•×ª ×©×œ ×—× ×•×ª ×”××™× ×˜×¨× ×˜ ×©×œ Chrome.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

à¤•à¥‹à¤¡: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

à¤¯à¤¹ à¤à¤•à¥à¤¸à¤Ÿà¥‡à¤‚à¤¶à¤¨ à¤¸à¤­à¥€ Chrome à¤µà¥‡à¤¬ à¤¸à¥à¤Ÿà¥‹à¤° à¤¨à¥€à¤¤à¤¿à¤¯à¥‹à¤‚ à¤”à¤° à¤¸à¥‡à¤µà¤¾ à¤•à¥€ à¤¶à¤°à¥à¤¤à¥‹à¤‚ à¤•à¤¾ à¤¸à¤–à¥à¤¤à¥€ à¤¸à¥‡ à¤ªà¤¾à¤²à¤¨ à¤•à¤°à¤¤à¤¾ à¤¹à¥ˆà¥¤

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

Ez a bÅ‘vÃ­tmÃ©ny szigorÃºan betartja a Chrome Internetes Ã¡ruhÃ¡z Ã¶sszes szabÃ¡lyzatÃ¡t Ã©s ÃltalÃ¡nos SzerzÅ‘dÃ©si FeltÃ©telÃ©t.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.
long.id:
Ekstensi Browser Boost menyediakan alternatif sumber terbuka yang menghormati privasi dibandingkan berbagai ekstensi sekali pakai.

Anda dapat mengandalkan Browser Boost daripada harus mempercayai banyak ekstensi dari berbagai pengembang, yang sering kali bersifat sumber tertutup, mengumpulkan data pengguna, dan memiliki izin tidak berdokumen.

Browser Boost tidak mengumpulkan data pengguna, tidak memerlukan pendaftaran, tidak memiliki server, sepenuhnya open source, dan 100% gratis.

-------------------------

Peralatan:

ğŸ”Š Tingkatkan Volume: Tingkatkan volume maksimum browser Anda hingga 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Ubah Agen Pengguna: Agen pengguna palsu untuk meniru perangkat atau browser yang berbeda.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Aktifkan Klik Kanan & Pilih: Aktifkan paksa klik kanan, salin, & pemilihan teks pada situs yang telah menonaktifkan klik kanan atau interaksi pemilihan.

ğŸ’¾ Simpan Gambar sebagai Jenis: Menambahkan menu konteks untuk menyimpan gambar sebagai JPG, PNG, atau WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Nonaktifkan WebRTC: Nonaktifkan permintaan WebRTC untuk mencegah kebocoran alamat IP.

-------------------------

Alasan Izin:

tabCapture: Untuk menangkap dan memodifikasi audio tab. Diperlukan untuk meningkatkan volume.

privasi: Untuk mengubah IPHandlingPolicy. Diperlukan untuk menonaktifkan WebRTC.

webNavigation: Untuk memicu pendengar onCommited dan onHistoryStateUpdated. Diperlukan untuk mengubah agen pengguna dan mengaktifkan klik kanan & pilih.

scripting: Untuk memasukkan skrip ke halaman web. Diperlukan untuk mengubah agen pengguna dan mengaktifkan klik kanan & pilih.

unduhan: Untuk memicu pengunduhan gambar yang dimodifikasi. Diperlukan untuk menyimpan gambar sebagai tipe.

konteksMenus: Untuk menambahkan opsi ke menu konteks. Diperlukan untuk menyimpan gambar sebagai tipe.

di luar layar: Untuk menggunakan tabCapture API dan kanvas HTML di pekerja layanan latar belakang. Diperlukan untuk meningkatkan volume dan menyimpan Gambar sebagai tipe.

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: Untuk mengubah header agen pengguna. Diperlukan untuk mengubah agen pengguna

penyimpanan: Untuk menyimpan pengaturan pengguna.

Izin host: Untuk memicu navigasi web di setiap situs web. Diperlukan untuk mengubah agen pengguna dan mengaktifkan klik kanan & pilih.

-------------------------

Kode: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

Ekstensi ini secara ketat mematuhi semua Kebijakan Toko Web Chrome dan Persyaratan Layanan.

long.it:
L'estensione Browser Boost fornisce un'alternativa open source che rispetta la privacy a numerose estensioni monouso.

Puoi fare affidamento su Browser Boost invece di doverti fidare di piÃ¹ estensioni di vari sviluppatori, che spesso sono closed source, raccolgono dati utente e sono dotate di autorizzazioni non documentate.

Browser Boost non raccoglie dati utente, non richiede registrazione, non ha server, Ã¨ interamente open source ed Ã¨ gratuito al 100%.

------------------------

Utensili:

ğŸ”Š Aumenta volume: aumenta il volume massimo del tuo browser fino al 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Cambia agente utente: falsifica l'agente utente per emulare diversi dispositivi o browser.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Abilita clic destro e selezione: forza l'abilitazione del clic destro, della copia e della selezione del testo sui siti che hanno disabilitato il clic destro o le interazioni di selezione.

ğŸ’¾ Salva immagine come tipo: aggiunge un menu contestuale per salvare le immagini come JPG, PNG o WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disabilita WebRTC: disabilita le richieste WebRTC per evitare fughe di indirizzi IP.

------------------------

Giustificazioni dell'autorizzazione:

tabCapture: per catturare e modificare l'audio di una scheda. Necessario per aumentare il volume.

privacy: per modificare la IPHandlingPolicy. Necessario per disabilitare WebRTC.

webNavigation: per attivare il listener onCommitted e onHistoryStateUpdated. Necessario per modificare l'agente utente e abilitare il clic con il tasto destro e seleziona.

scripting: per inserire script nelle pagine web. Necessario per modificare l'agente utente e abilitare il clic con il tasto destro e seleziona.

download: per attivare il download dell'immagine modificata. Necessario per salvare l'immagine come tipo.

contextMenus: per aggiungere un'opzione al menu contestuale. Necessario per salvare l'immagine come tipo.

fuori schermo: per utilizzare l'API tabCapture e il canvas HTML nel lavoratore del servizio in background. Necessario per aumentare il volume e salvare Immagine come tipo.

dichiarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: per modificare l'intestazione dell'agente utente. Necessario per cambiare agente utente

memorizzazione: per memorizzare le impostazioni dell'utente.

Autorizzazione host: per attivare la navigazione web su ogni sito web. Necessario per modificare l'agente utente e abilitare il clic con il tasto destro e seleziona.

------------------------

Codice: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

ì´ í™•ì¥ í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ì€ ëª¨ë“  Chrome ì›¹ ìŠ¤í† ì–´ ì •ì±… ë° ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ì•½ê´€ì„ ì—„ê²©í•˜ê²Œ ì¤€ìˆ˜í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

à¤•à¥‹à¤¡: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

à¤¹à¤¾ à¤µà¤¿à¤¸à¥à¤¤à¤¾à¤° à¤¸à¤°à¥à¤µ Chrome à¤µà¥‡à¤¬ à¤¸à¥à¤Ÿà¥‹à¤…à¤° à¤§à¥‹à¤°à¤£à¥‡ à¤†à¤£à¤¿ à¤¸à¥‡à¤µà¤¾ à¤…à¤Ÿà¥€à¤‚à¤šà¥‡ à¤•à¤¾à¤Ÿà¥‡à¤•à¥‹à¤°à¤ªà¤£à¥‡ à¤ªà¤¾à¤²à¤¨ à¤•à¤°à¤¤à¥‹.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

long.ms:
Sambungan Browser Boost menyediakan sumber terbuka, alternatif yang menghormati privasi kepada banyak sambungan sekali guna.

Anda boleh bergantung pada Browser Boost dan bukannya perlu mempercayai berbilang sambungan daripada pelbagai pembangun, yang selalunya sumber tertutup, mengumpul data pengguna dan disertakan dengan kebenaran tidak berdokumen.

Browser Boost tidak mengumpul data pengguna, tidak memerlukan pendaftaran, tidak mempunyai pelayan, sumber terbuka sepenuhnya dan 100% percuma.

-------------------------

Alatan:

ğŸ”Š Tingkatkan Kelantangan: Tingkatkan volum maksimum penyemak imbas anda sehingga 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Tukar Ejen Pengguna: Ejen pengguna palsu untuk meniru peranti atau penyemak imbas yang berbeza.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Dayakan Klik Kanan & Pilih: Paksa dayakan klik kanan, salin & pemilihan teks pada tapak yang telah melumpuhkan klik kanan atau interaksi pilihan.

ğŸ’¾ Simpan Imej sebagai Jenis: Menambah menu konteks untuk menyimpan imej sebagai JPG, PNG atau WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Lumpuhkan WebRTC: Lumpuhkan permintaan WebRTC untuk mengelakkan kebocoran alamat IP.

-------------------------

Justifikasi kebenaran:

tabCapture: Untuk menangkap dan mengubah suai audio tab. Diperlukan untuk meningkatkan kelantangan.

privasi: Untuk mengubah suai IPHandlingPolicy. Diperlukan untuk melumpuhkan WebRTC.

webNavigation: Untuk mencetuskan pendengar onCommitted dan onHistoryStateUpdated. Diperlukan untuk menukar ejen pengguna dan mendayakan klik kanan & pilih.

skrip: Untuk menyuntik skrip ke dalam halaman web. Diperlukan untuk menukar ejen pengguna dan mendayakan klik kanan & pilih.

muat turun: Untuk mencetuskan muat turun imej yang diubah suai. Diperlukan untuk menyimpan imej sebagai jenis.

contextMenus: Untuk menambah pilihan pada menu konteks. Diperlukan untuk menyimpan imej sebagai jenis.

luar skrin: Untuk menggunakan API tabCapture dan kanvas HTML dalam pekerja perkhidmatan latar belakang. Diperlukan untuk meningkatkan kelantangan dan menyimpan Imej sebagai jenis.

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: Untuk mengubah suai pengepala ejen pengguna. Diperlukan untuk menukar ejen pengguna

storan: Untuk menyimpan tetapan pengguna.

Kebenaran hos: Untuk mencetuskan webNavigation pada setiap tapak web. Diperlukan untuk menukar ejen pengguna dan mendayakan klik kanan & pilih.

-------------------------

Kod: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

Sambungan ini mematuhi semua Dasar dan Syarat Perkhidmatan Kedai Web Chrome.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

long.nl:
De Browser Boost-extensie biedt een open-source, privacy-respecterend alternatief voor talloze extensies voor eenmalig gebruik.

U kunt op Browser Boost vertrouwen in plaats van dat u meerdere extensies van verschillende ontwikkelaars moet vertrouwen, die vaak closed source zijn, gebruikersgegevens verzamelen en ongedocumenteerde machtigingen hebben.

Browser Boost verzamelt geen gebruikersgegevens, vereist geen aanmelding, heeft geen servers, is volledig open source en is 100% gratis.

-----------------------

Hulpmiddelen:

ğŸ”Š Volume verhogen: verhoog het maximale volume van uw browser tot 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Gebruikersagent wijzigen: Spoof gebruikersagent om verschillende apparaten of browsers te emuleren.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Rechtsklikken en selecteren inschakelen: Forceer rechtsklikken, kopiÃ«ren en tekstselectie op sites waarop rechtsklikken of selectie-interacties zijn uitgeschakeld.

ğŸ’¾ Afbeelding opslaan als type: voegt een contextmenu toe om afbeeldingen op te slaan als JPG, PNG of WebP.

ğŸ’¬ WebRTC uitschakelen: schakel WebRTC-verzoeken uit om lekken van IP-adressen te voorkomen.

-----------------------

Toestemmingsmotivaties:

tabCapture: om de audio van een tabblad vast te leggen en te wijzigen. Vereist om het volume te verhogen.

privacy: Om het IPHandlingPolicy te wijzigen. Vereist om WebRTC uit te schakelen.

webNavigatie: om de onComposed- en onHistoryStateUpdated-listener te activeren. Vereist om de user-agent te wijzigen en rechtsklikken en selecteren in te schakelen.

scripting: Om scripts in webpagina's te injecteren. Vereist om de user-agent te wijzigen en rechtsklikken en selecteren in te schakelen.

downloads: Om het downloaden van een gewijzigde afbeelding te activeren. Vereist om afbeelding als type op te slaan.

contextMenus: Om een â€‹â€‹optie aan het contextmenu toe te voegen. Vereist om afbeelding als type op te slaan.

offscreen: om de tabCapture API en HTML-canvas in de achtergrondservicemedewerker te gebruiken. Vereist om het volume te verhogen en Afbeelding als type op te slaan.

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: om de header van de user-agent te wijzigen. Vereist om de user-agent te wijzigen

opslag: Om gebruikersinstellingen op te slaan.

Hosttoestemming: om webnavigatie op elke website te activeren. Vereist om de user-agent te wijzigen en rechtsklikken en selecteren in te schakelen.

-----------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

Deze extensie voldoet strikt aan het beleid en de servicevoorwaarden van de Chrome Web Store.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select.

Ğ­Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑˆĞ¸Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ²ĞµÑ‚ÑÑ‚Ğ²ÑƒĞµÑ‚ Ğ²ÑĞµĞ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¸ ÑƒÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸ÑĞ¼ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ˜Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ½ĞµÑ‚-Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°Ğ·Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ° Chrome.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

à®‡à®¨à¯à®¤ à®¨à¯€à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà®¿à®ªà¯à®ªà¯ à®…à®©à¯ˆà®¤à¯à®¤à¯ Chrome à®‡à®£à¯ˆà®¯ à®…à®™à¯à®•à®¾à®Ÿà®¿ à®•à¯Šà®³à¯à®•à¯ˆà®•à®³à¯ à®®à®±à¯à®±à¯à®®à¯ à®šà¯‡à®µà¯ˆ à®µà®¿à®¤à®¿à®®à¯à®±à¯ˆà®•à®³à¯à®Ÿà®©à¯ à®•à®£à¯à®Ÿà®¿à®ªà¯à®ªà®¾à®• à®‡à®£à®™à¯à®•à¯à®•à®¿à®±à®¤à¯.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

à°ˆ à°ªà±Šà°¡à°¿à°—à°¿à°‚à°ªà± à°…à°¨à±à°¨à°¿ Chrome à°µà±†à°¬à± à°¸à±à°Ÿà±‹à°°à± à°µà°¿à°§à°¾à°¨à°¾à°²à± à°®à°°à°¿à°¯à± à°¸à±‡à°µà°¾ à°¨à°¿à°¬à°‚à°§à°¨à°²à°•à± à°–à°šà±à°šà°¿à°¤à°‚à°—à°¾ à°•à°Ÿà±à°Ÿà±à°¬à°¡à°¿ à°‰à°‚à°Ÿà±à°‚à°¦à°¿.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

à¸ªà¹ˆà¸§à¸™à¸‚à¸¢à¸²à¸¢à¸™à¸µà¹‰à¸›à¸à¸´à¸šà¸±à¸•à¸´à¸•à¸²à¸¡à¸™à¹‚à¸¢à¸šà¸²à¸¢à¹à¸¥à¸°à¸‚à¹‰à¸­à¸à¸³à¸«à¸™à¸”à¹ƒà¸™à¸à¸²à¸£à¹ƒà¸«à¹‰à¸šà¸£à¸´à¸à¸²à¸£à¸‚à¸­à¸‡ Chrome à¹€à¸§à¹‡à¸šà¸ªà¹‚à¸•à¸£à¹Œà¸—à¸±à¹‰à¸‡à¸«à¸¡à¸”à¸­à¸¢à¹ˆà¸²à¸‡à¹€à¸„à¸£à¹ˆà¸‡à¸„à¸£à¸±à¸”

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Browser Boost extension provides an open-source, privacy respecting alternative to numerous single-use extensions.

You can rely on Browser Boost instead of having to trust multiple extensions from various developers, which are often closed source, collect user data, and come with undocumented permissions.

Browser Boost collects no user data, does not require signup, has no servers, is entirely open source, and is 100% free.

-------------------------

Tools:

ğŸ”Š Boost Volume: Increase the maximum volume of your browser up to 600%.

ğŸ•µï¸ Change User Agent: Spoof user agent to emulate different devices or browsers.

ğŸ–±ï¸ Enable Right Click & Select: Force enable right clicks, copy, & text selection on sites that have disabled right clicks or selection interactions.

ğŸ’¾ Save Image as Type: Adds context menu to save images as JPG, PNG or WebP.

ğŸ’¬ Disable WebRTC: Disable WebRTC requests to prevent IP address leaks.

-------------------------

Permission Justifications:

tabCapture: To capture and modify the audio of a tab. Required to boost volume. 

privacy: To modify the IPHandlingPolicy. Required to disable WebRTC.

webNavigation: To trigger onCommitted and onHistoryStateUpdated listener. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

scripting: To inject scripts into webpages. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

downloads: To trigger download of modified image. Required to save image as type.

contextMenus: To add option to context menu. Required to save image as type.

offscreen: To use the tabCapture API and HTML canvas in the background service worker. Required to boost volume and save Image as type. 

declarativeNetRequestWithHostAccess: To modify user agent header. Required to change user agent

storage: To store user settings.

Host permission: To trigger webNavigation on every website. Required to change user agent and enable right click & select. 

-------------------------

Code: https://github.com/BrowserBoost/Extension

This extension strictly adheres to all Chrome Web Store Policies and Terms of Service.
